ExtendedSection.Title: Step 4: Insert containers and enable "Advanced Direct Edit" 2

Text.name: Text0
Text.content: Somewhere in the prototype, there might be sections with content that should be editable by the content editor. Remove the HTML of these sections and insert a <cms:container> tag instead. This will enable the content editor to place elements via drag-and-drop.
